channel.title: issue with connection settings firefox
channel.description:
hello,
i was following this guide
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services#Whonix-Gateway
everything goes ok but..
i noticed this:
Note, accessing 127.0.0.1 Local connections are no longer possible due to a change in Tor Browser by The Tor Project. Check Tor Browser, Local Connections for more information and a workaround..
i have in connection settings this configuration:
SOCKS HOST : file:///var/run/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor/127.0.0.1_9150.sock
with the PORT 9150
i put no proxy for 127.0.0.1
i have to change something?
is it correct?
thanks
